welcome_message_body: Welcome to Venice, the enchanting city of canals and historical beauty! Get ready to immerse yourself in the charming atmosphere, explore the stunning architecture, and savor the delicious cuisine. Enjoy your time in this magical city!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at S. Angelo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for charter and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.
